name: Safe IPN Guard
description:
A tiny client-side Fabric compatibility shim that prevents an IndexOutOfBoundsException crash when using Inventory Profiles Next (IPN) together with Tiny Item Animations (TIA). It clamps out-of-range slot indices so automated moves (like the UP arrow action) donâ€™t crash the client.

Confirmed working on Minecraft 1.21.8 with Fabric Loader 0.16.14, IPN 2.1.11, TIA 1.2.3.
